summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2843 for the improvement of Thirty-eighth Avenue South, from Genesee Street to a point about 160 feet south of the south margin of Conover Way, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing a wooden box sewer for the proper sewerage and drainage of said district, under Ordinance No. 34282, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
